I believe that many of the traditions still practiced today involving Christmas were derived from Pagan roots. For example, misletoe is a Christmas tradition with pagan roots, as is the yule log. There are many other little bits and pieces of our Christmas traditions which have their roots in the pagan holiday, Yule.
